item.title: Some SNAP recipients have to choose between rent and food amid halt in benefits
item.description: Some Americans who saw their SNAP benefits halt on Nov. 1 say they have to choose between paying their rent and buying food.

item.title: WATCH: Tate McRae caught singing into upside-down mic
item.description: Pop star Tate McRae had a viral moment after performing into the wrong end of her microphone.
